page.title: 04BIRCOTES LIBRARY.A SURVEY
page.content: {193O}The first books were provided by the Nottingham County library service in the 1930's.The library was initially operated from the miners institute.Various premises were used including the local school and shops. Bircotes first library was opened in 1956,with 12000 books.{1980's}Now the library has got there own premises,it is much bigger. We went to the library to interview people,using it.We found out that 36% of the people visited it about once a week 44% visited less often 20% visited more often.We also asked if they preferred fiction or non-fiction. 56% preferred fiction,32% prefered non-fiction. 12% preferred fiction and non-fiction equally.The most popular fiction subject was historical novels, the most popular non-fiction subject was hobbies.20% of people borrowed 4 books each week.
